title: Minecraft Redstone
content: Discovered the magic of logic and systems while building contraptions in Minecraft with redstone dust.

title: Bedroom Dash
content: Inspired by Percy Jackson, Grace built a room control dashboard with a Wii remote and Java to play music and stream Netflix.

title: Swoll iOS App
content: Attempted her first mobile app: a circuit workout tool with two pages, made entirely in Xcode on a virtual Mac setup.

title: The Race Project
content: Created a scavenger hunt web app with Firebase for her friends—her first full-stack project (though she did not know it at the time).

title: Jack the Jeep
content: Installed a Raspberry Pi-powered infotainment system in her Jeep, complete with a custom UI and Bluetooth audio.

title: LDS SQL + Pi
content: Helped maintain a SQL server connected to a Raspberry Pi and Google APIs, supporting a live data dashboard.

title: DevX @ UCLA
content: Built a collaborative music discovery app using React, React Native, Git, and the Spotify API with a team of 14 engineers.

title: Apple Internship
content: Worked on internal tooling and networking infrastructure—presented her final project to the VP of Software Engineering.
